channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Kanban Boards for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Kanban Boards for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2023-0873|2024-08-02T05:24:34.593Z -- unknown -- kanban%20boards%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Kanban Boards for WordPress plugin before 2.5.21 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
